CREATE PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_AccountsByAttributeExport]
(
	@ParametersXML AS XML
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	DECLARE	@Agencies AS VARCHAR(1000) = NULL, @Attributes VARCHAR(1000) = NULL, @UserId AS INT, @Email AS VARCHAR(50) = NULL;

	DECLARE @ParameterTbl TABLE
		(SearchTerm VARCHAR(1000) NULL,
		Agencies VARCHAR(1000) NULL,
		Facilities VARCHAR(1000) NULL,
		Attributes VARCHAR(1000) NULL,
		isAdvanceSearch BIT NULL,
		UserID INT NULL);

	WITH cte AS
	(SELECT
		p.value('SearchTerm[1]', 'varchar(200)') as SearchTerm,
		p.value('IsAdvanceSearch[1]', 'bit') as IsAdvanceSearch,
		p.query('Facility') as Facility,
		p.query('Agency') as Agency,
		p.query('Attribute') as Attribute,
		p.value('UserId[1]','int') as UserId
	  FROM
		@ParametersXML.nodes('/SearchModel') p(p))

	INSERT INTO @ParameterTbl
		(SearchTerm
		,isAdvanceSearch
		,Facilities
		,Agencies
		,Attributes
		,UserId)
	SELECT
		SearchTerm,
		IsAdvanceSearch,
		(SELECT d.value('.', 'varchar(100)')+',' from cte.Facility.nodes('Facility') d(d) FOR XML PATH('')) AS Facility,
		CASE
			WHEN (SELECT w.value('.', 'varchar(1000)')+',' FROM cte.Agency.nodes('Agency') w(w) FOR XML PATH('')) = '*,' THEN NULL
			ELSE (SELECT w.value('.', 'varchar(1000)')+',' FROM cte.Agency.nodes('Agency') w(w) FOR XML PATH(''))
		END AS Agency,
		(SELECT w.value('.', 'varchar(100)')+',' FROM cte.Attribute.nodes('Attribute') w(w)	FOR XML PATH('')) AS Attribute,
		UserId
	FROM cte;

	SELECT @Agencies = '' + LEFT(Agencies, LEN(Agencies) -1) + '', @Attributes = '' + LEFT(Attributes, LEN(Attributes)-1) + '',	@UserId = UserID FROM @ParameterTbl;
	SELECT @Email = Email FROM Membership.EC3Membership WHERE AuthenticatedUserID = @UserId;

	-- table variable to hold temp results
	DECLARE @SearchHits TABLE (UniqueAccountSeqid INT NULL, AccountSeqId INT NULL, [RowNumber] INT NULL, [RowCount] INT NULL);
	
	IF(@Attributes IS NULL)
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO @SearchHits
			(UniqueAccountSeqid, 
		    AccountSeqId, 
			RowNumber, 
			[RowCount])							
		SELECT DISTINCT 
			AV.UniqueAccountSeqid,
			AV.AccountSeqId,
			NULL RowNumber,
			NULL [RowCount]
		FROM Billing.uvw_AccountSearchView AS AV
			INNER JOIN ( SELECT zx.AgencyCodeOEC FROM dbo.uftn_TableGetAgencyByEmailAddressAgencyAccessAction(@Email) zx) AS fag ON AV.AgencyCodeOEC = fag.AgencyCodeOEC			
		WHERE (CASE WHEN @Agencies IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1) OR AV.AgencyCodeOEC IN (SELECT  Item FROM [dbo].[ufnSplit](@Agencies, ','));
	END;
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @Attribute TABLE (Item VARCHAR(1000));
		INSERT INTO @Attribute (Item) SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(Item, 'P', ''), 'C', '') FROM dbo.ufnSplit(@Attributes, ',');

		INSERT INTO @SearchHits
			(UniqueAccountSeqid, 
		    AccountSeqId, 
			RowNumber, 
			[RowCount])
		SELECT DISTINCT 
			AV.UniqueAccountSeqid,
			AV.AccountSeqId,
			NULL RowNumber,
			NULL [RowCount]
		FROM Billing.uvw_AccountSearchView AS AV
			INNER JOIN (SELECT zx.AgencyCodeOEC FROM dbo.uftn_TableGetAgencyByEmailAddressAgencyAccessAction(@Email) zx) AS fag ON AV.AgencyCodeOEC = fag.AgencyCodeOEC
			INNER JOIN Billing.AccountProgramAttributeType AS apat ON AV.UniqueAccountSeqid = apat.AccountUniqueSeqID					
		WHERE ((CASE WHEN @Agencies IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1) OR AV.AgencyCodeOEC IN (SELECT Item FROM dbo.ufnSplit(@Agencies, ',')))
			AND (apat.AttributeTypeOptionSeqid IN (SELECT Item FROM @Attribute)	OR apat.AttributeStatusOptionSeqid IN (SELECT Item FROM @Attribute));
	END;

	DECLARE @AccountAttributes TABLE (UniqueAccountSeqid INT NOT NULL, ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid INT NOT NULL, Attributes VARCHAR(500) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (UniqueAccountSeqid, ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid));
	INSERT INTO @AccountAttributes(UniqueAccountSeqid, ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid, Attributes)
	SELECT A.UniqueAccountSeqid, AP.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid, STUFF((SELECT ', ' + ATO.[ShortDescription]
		FROM Billing.AccountProgramAttributeType AS AP1  
			INNER JOIN Billing.AttributeTypeOption AS ATO ON ATO.AttributeTypeSeqid = AP1.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid
				AND ATO.AttributeTypeOptionSeqid = AP1.AttributeStatusOptionSeqid
		WHERE A.UniqueAccountSeqid = AP1.AccountUniqueSeqID AND AP1.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = AP.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid
		FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS [Attributes]
		FROM @SearchHits AS A
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountProgramAttributeType AS AP ON A.UniqueAccountSeqid = AP.AccountUniqueSeqID
		WHERE AP.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid IS NOT NULL AND AP.AttributeStatusOptionSeqid IS NOT NULL AND AP.AttributeStatusSeqid IS NULL
	GROUP BY A.UniqueAccountSeqid, AP.AccountUniqueSeqID, AP.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid
	UNION
	SELECT A.UniqueAccountSeqid, AP.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid, STUFF((SELECT ', ' + ATO.[ShortDescription]
		FROM Billing.AccountProgramAttributeType AS AP1  
			INNER JOIN Billing.AttributeTypeOption AS ATO ON ATO.AttributeTypeSeqid = AP1.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid
				AND ATO.AttributeTypeOptionSeqid = AP1.AttributeTypeOptionSeqid
		WHERE AP1.AccountUniqueSeqID = A.UniqueAccountSeqid AND AP1.AttributeStatusSeqid = AP.AttributeStatusSeqid
		FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS [Attributes]
		FROM Billing.Account AS A
		INNER JOIN Billing.AccountProgramAttributeType AS AP ON A.UniqueAccountSeqid = AP.AccountUniqueSeqID
		WHERE AP.AttributeStatusSeqid IS NOT NULL AND AP.AttributeTypeOptionSeqid IS NOT NULL
	GROUP BY A.UniqueAccountSeqid, AP.ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid, AP.AttributeStatusSeqid;
	
	SELECT AV.CurrentAccountNumber AS [Account Number],
		AV.FacilityName AS [Facility Name],
		AV.FacilityAddress AS [Facility Address],		
		AV.UtilityServiceAddress AS [Utility Service Address],
		AV.OecFacilityNumber AS [OEC Facility Number],		
		AV.EnergyDeliveryType AS [Energy Type],
		AV.UtilityCompany AS [Utility Company],
		AV.DeliveryTariffRate AS [Tariff Code],
		AV.BudgetGroupDEMName AS [Tariff Description],
		AV.AgencyName AS [Agency Name],
		AV.AgencyCodeOEC AS [Agency Code OEC],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 5) AS [UtilityIntervalMeter],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 2) AS [DemarcationBox],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 4) AS [DistributedGenerationType],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 11) AS [NetMetered],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 1) AS [DemandResponse],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 6) AS [Real-TimeMetering],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 13) AS [High Pressure Gas],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 14) AS [AMI],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 17) AS [AMR],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 19) AS [Transportation-Electric],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 20) AS [Transportation-Other],	
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 21) AS [Gas Reconciliation],
		(SELECT Attributes FROM @AccountAttributes WHERE UniqueAccountSeqid = AV.UniqueAccountSeqid AND ProgramAttributeTypeSeqid = 18) AS [Con Edison Network],
		AV.IsActive	  
	FROM @SearchHits AS sh
		INNER JOIN Billing.uvw_AccountSearchView AS AV ON AV.AccountSeqId = sh.AccountSeqId
	ORDER BY AV.CurrentAccountNumber ASC;
END;
